subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador of Spain, the winner of the 2007 Tour de France, has confirmed that he will ride for Astana in 2009. Contador’s future had been unclear after Lance Armstrong joined the team.
snippet: Alberto Contador of Spain, the winner of the 2007 Tour de France, has confirmed that he will ride for Astana in 2009. Contador’s future had been unclear after Lance Armstrong joined the team.
